name: scl
description: A collection of typed containers for JavaScript.

scripts.coveralls: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.build-docs: typedoc src/ --exclude src/test/ --out docs --includeDeclarations --excludeExternals --excludeNotExported --excludeExternals --excludeProtected --mode file --name 'Standard Collections Library for JavaScript' --readme readme-docs.md

author: Sam Vervaeck
